data.name: small thumbnails, no background
data.description: Makes thumbnails in Eclipse smaller, adds more space, always shows titles, and removes the background, to emulate the old dA style.

data.name: Twixer
data.description:
Custom 2019 Twitch style. Use with FrankerFaceZ extension (recommended). also enable Dark Theme. 
Use it with Stylus not stylish(not getting updates anymore).

data.description: Doing math for a long time when your assignment is due tomorrow is hard. Use this dark theme to make it easier on your eyes and easier to concentrate too.
